name: Finizen
flavorText: It likes playing with others of its kind using the water ring on its tail. It uses ultrasonic waves to sense the emotions of other living creatures.

previous.name: Bombirdier
previous.flavorText: It gathers things up in an apron made from shed feathers added to the Pokémon’s chest feathers, then drops those things from high places for fun.

pokemon.name: Finizen
